moves.1. e3 e5 2. d4 f6 3. c4 Bb4+ 4. Nc3 exd4: I have the feeling Slappy is better than his rating suggests.  He's only played 6 games, so I think he's just new to the sight.  He's aggressive, which can be bad for Black.  I'm going to...
moves.10. Qa4+: Check with my Queen, attacking his Bishop on the side.  His best move will be Ne7c6....
moves.10... Ne7c6: Which covers his Bishop, but pins his Knight.  How to exploit the pin?...
moves.11. Nxe5: Maybe later.  This capture and resultant exchange should give me material advantage.
moves.12. Nxc6: I'll recapture later, first I'll capture Black's Knight, and attack Black's Queen.
moves.13. Qxc6+: Up 1!  How will Black respond? Kf7 is best...
moves.14... Re8 15. a3 Bxc3 16. Bxc3 Rb8 17. R: Oops!  I think Slappy will regret this.
moves.18... g6 19. c5: Now he thinks @#$%!...  What will he do?  If he can't find a counter attack, the only safe square for his Rook is b8...
